name: Lion
description: Lions are large carnivorous mammals that belong to the family of felines. They have a powerful build and are known for their strength and majestic mane.

name: Meerkat
description: Meerkats are small mongooses known for their upright posture and social behavior. They live in large underground networks in deserts and savannas.

name: Warthog
description: Warthogs are wild members of the pig family that live in grassland, savanna, and woodland in sub-Saharan Africa. They are known for their distinctive tusks.

name: African Plains
description: The African Plains exhibit showcases the diverse wildlife of the African savanna, including zebras, giraffes, and other iconic animals.

name: Zebra
description: Zebras are African equids best known for their distinctive black and white striped coats. Each zebra's stripes are unique.

name: Giraffe
description: Giraffes are the tallest land animals, known for their long necks and legs, and spotted patterns. They are native to African savannas and woodlands.

name: Elephant
description: Elephants are the largest land animals on Earth. They are known for their intelligence, social structure, and long trunks.

name: Black Rhino
description: Black rhinos are critically endangered species known for their hooked upper lip which they use to grasp leaves and twigs.

name: Cheetah
description: Cheetahs are known for their incredible speed, reaching up to 60-70 mph in short bursts covering distances up to 500 meters.

name: Jaguar
description: Jaguars are large felines native to the Americas, known for their powerful build, and distinctive spotted coats.

name: Capybara
description: Capybaras are the largest rodents in the world. They are highly social animals and live in groups near water bodies in South America.

name: Sloth Bear
description: Sloth bears are native to the Indian subcontinent and are known for their shaggy fur, long claws, and unique feeding habits on insects.

name: Tiger
description: Tigers are the largest species among the Felidae and are recognized for their pattern of dark vertical stripes on reddish-orange fur.

name: Panda
description: Pandas are bear-like animals native to south-central China. They are known for their distinctive black and white coloring and diet consisting mainly of bamboo.

name: Capuchin Monkeys
description: Capuchin monkeys are small primates known for their intelligence and dexterity. Native to South America, they are often recognized by their distinctive tufted hair.

name: Gorillas
description: Gorillas are the largest of the primates and are native to the forests of central Africa. They are known for their gentle behavior and complex social structures.

name: Orangutans
description: Orangutans are large apes with distinctive orange fur, native to the rainforests of Borneo and Sumatra. They are highly intelligent and spend most of their time in trees.

name: Siamangs
description: Siamangs are the largest of the gibbons, known for their impressive vocalizations. They are native to the forests of Malaysia and Indonesia.

name: Fern Canyon
description: Fern Canyon is a lush, green exhibit featuring a variety of fern species. It provides a cool, shaded environment reminiscent of a prehistoric landscape.

name: Parker Aviary
description: Parker Aviary is a large, open-air enclosure housing a variety of bird species. It provides visitors with an immersive experience to observe birds in a naturalistic setting.

name: Toucan
description: Toucans are known for their large, colorful beaks and vibrant plumage. They are native to the tropical forests of Central and South America.

name: Blue Capped Motmot
description: The Blue Capped Motmot is a colorful bird with a distinctive racket-shaped tail. It is native to the forests of Central America.

name: Scripps Aviary
description: Scripps Aviary is a large aviary featuring a diverse collection of birds from around the world. It offers a tranquil environment for bird-watching.

name: Spoonbill
description: Spoonbills are wading birds known for their distinctive flat, spoon-shaped bills. They can be found in marshes and wetlands around the world.

name: Hippos
description: Hippos are large, semi-aquatic mammals native to sub-Saharan Africa. They spend much of their time in water to stay cool and are known for their massive size.

name: Crocodiles
description: Crocodiles are large reptiles found in tropical regions around the world. Known for their powerful jaws and aggressive nature, they are apex predators in their habitats.

name: Owens Aviary
description: Owens Aviary is a spacious aviary that houses a variety of exotic birds. It provides a naturalistic habitat for birds to fly and interact.

name: Bali Mynah
description: The Bali Mynah is a critically endangered bird native to the island of Bali in Indonesia. It is known for its striking white plumage and blue facial skin.

name: Emerald Dove
description: The Emerald Dove is a small, colorful bird found in Southeast Asia. It is named for its bright green wings and is often seen foraging on the forest floor.

name: Koi Feeding Tour
description: Join us for a tranquil morning tour where you can feed the beautiful koi fish. Learn about their care, behavior, and the significance of koi in various cultures. A guided experience perfect for all ages.

name: Panda Guided Tour
description: Embark on a guided tour to visit our beloved pandas. Learn fascinating facts about their diet, habitat, and conservation efforts from our knowledgeable guides. An unforgettable experience for panda enthusiasts.

name: Safari Tour
description: Experience the thrill of an African safari right here at the zoo. Our guided Safari Tour takes you through the habitats of majestic jaguars and other exotic wildlife. Learn about their behaviors, environments, and the efforts to protect these incredible creatures.
